metadata.title: CVE-2019-6471 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition which may occur when discarding malformed packets canresult in BIND exiting due to a REQUIRE assertion failure in dispatch.c.Versions affected: BIND 9.11.0 -> 9.11.7, 9.12.0 -> 9.12.4-P1, 9.14.0 ->9.14.2. Also all releases of the BIND 9.13 development branch and version9.15.0 of the BIND 9.15 development branch and BIND Supported PreviewEdition versions 9.11.3-S1 -> 9.11.7-S1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
bind9-host - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
bind9utils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
dnsutils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
libbind9-160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
libdns-export1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
libdns1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
libirs-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
libirs160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.8
